website_summaries.verdict: This best-selling solar charger is a great fit for large, remote pastures.
pros: Solar system that ships with a battery
Powers up to 30 miles of fencing
Solid build, with a metal housing
cons: Some buyers report that this option arrives used

customer_reviews.title: Bears beware!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure just how many volts/joules/amps, this thing is actually putting out, but my tester tops out a t 10,000 volts, and this thing maxed it out. I'm not brave enough to grab hold and test it. Just so long as it keeps the bears, racoons, and skunks out of our bee yard, we'll be happy. I charged it for three days before putting it up, and the only difficulty I had was that it puts out so much power that it was jumping the length of my wire mounts and arcing to the steel fence posts. I did some adjusting and a little extra insulating, and now it appears to be working great.
customer_reviews.author: med1pilot

customer_reviews.title: Failed repeatedly, should not be best seller
customer_reviews.text: Circuit has continued to fail repeatedly. Since we use this to keep bears out of our apiary, the seller wouldn't send us a new circuit board prior to us send the defective one back albeit there was supposed to be a 3 year warranty. Additionally they've had "issues" with other customers wanting to send back just the circuit board AFTER receiving the replacement. The issue is we could not be without a working electric fence while wanting for them to fix our circuit board knowing bears would destroy our apiary. Customer service just doesn't get it.
customer_reviews.author: off the cuff

customer_reviews.title: Still kickin after 5 years
customer_reviews.text: I'm just 1 month shy of 5 years and hoped on here to order a new battery. I use this charger at a remote cabin to protect a garden. Set it and forget it. Even when weeds grow up touching the line, it still functions. if I can offer advice I'd give you 2 things. First get the biggest grounding rods you can get in the ground. Second place some strips of aluminum foil folded in half over the top wire (like a 4-6" piece) then smear a little peanut butter or bacon grease on the foil. This will help train the local dear population. Never an issue with this charger, and the battery lasted almost 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: A A Ron

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy set up, paint is inferior, but I don't really care. Saw another review where someone thought the fencer was used. Not so, just bad paint jobs is all. Put plumber's putty around the exit wire hole for the solar panel to keep moisture and rain out. So far no issues with a foggy indicator window. Works well to keep Whitetail deer out of my garden area. Never seen the deer touch it, but let's just say they now keep a healthy distance away from the fence. Will keep all updated if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: hesty24

customer_reviews.title: Does its job.
customer_reviews.text: Very rugged and well built. Solar feature seems to work well as long as you place it in direct sunlight. Makes a nice spark. I have run wire from this unit for about a quarter of a mile total and at the far ends it makes a nice hot spark. I used two 8 ft copper clad grounding rods for the ground side of the circuit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph_

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great the first two growing seasons but developed some bizarre behavior the third year. Normally, it would pulse about once a second, but all of a sudden, it began to pulse about twice a second. It then reverted back to it's original pulse rate. Now, it changes back and forth between the two without warning. I have tested the charge during both of its moods and have found no change, so it is still doing the job its designed for, which is keeping critters out of the garden!
customer_reviews.author: loosecannon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 14 months, meter inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: After 14 months stopped working completely. It costs $20 to ship to the repair center probably another $20 back. Since I can’t be without a working fence for the couple of weeks it takes to get it fixed I had to order another controllers. There is also the hassle of reinstalling. In addition the built in high voltage meter is inaccurate (when it was working). The meter keeps showing over 10kv while I measured with two different meters and it actually puts out 6.5kv at the box output.
customer_reviews.author: MuchHat

customer_reviews.title: Performance to price is Poor
customer_reviews.text: Doe not hold a charge for even 8 hours. Bought two units will be returning them within the week. The unit is built well. Yes I charged it for 5+ days in direct sunlight the charge was full. The unit get a lot of sun. The first day the charge held good then after the performance has been bad. Works the same some the cheap once for half the price. I purchase one at the local feed store for $150 that holds the charge all day.
customer_reviews.author: Roshan Weerasinghe

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again, surprised for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. I was looking to put a temporary fence for my horses (roughly 3 acres). No need for power. I set it up to charge for a couple days before use, but even on the cloudy/rainy weeks this things holds its charge. I will be adding wires around my permanent fencing. The animals learn to respect the fence quickly. I even ran a ground wire on the bottom and it contained my chickens in the same pasture. I'll give it five stars, but pick up something to mount it to a fence post.
customer_reviews.author: terry l.

customer_reviews.title: No customer service
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for two days then broke, know this if you buy a fence charger from Amazon, they will not take it back, you are on your own. Parmak is making good on it but I will never buy anything like this ever again from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Gardenier

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend this product to someone looking for a powerful solar ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything received and functioning as advertised. I used this to make an electric fence around my garden and it is able to deliver 5kV for the entire length of my fence. Since going into service it has seen a lot of cloudy weather and the battery meter has still been able to stay pegged fully to the right for the entire time. I haven't personally seen any critters encountering the fence but look forward to losing less product this year. Would definitely recommend this product to someone looking for a powerful solar fence energizer.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work at all when we first got it. Took it apart and discovered it wasn’t connected on the inside. Works great until it dies. This is our 5 or sixth one. All are dead after about a year and a half. We will upgrade to Gallagher. If this product would last longer it would be a 5 star but quality must be pretty poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 4 months!!
customer_reviews.text: Product did not arrive with "secure mount" as advertised (no big deal). BUT, unit failed after 4 months of use (April to August. Manufacturer requires it to be returned (on my dime) to be evaluated before a replacement/repair is made. Amazon WOULD not help in return at all. DO NOT BUY this product!
customer_reviews.author: Davey C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Very powerful, easy to set up (we had zero experience with electric fencing), and the display aids in trouble-shooting. If the needle isn't solidly in the green zone, I go looking for twigs on the wires! It costs more than others, but it is solidly built and more powerful than the ones at the feed store, and my goat buck needed to get the message in order to quit jumping over the fence!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: gret service
customer_reviews.text: After 3 years we had a problem with our Mag-12-SP.We contacted Parmak and sent it back.They were very friendly and helpful.It was repaired for a small fee and sent back to us promptly.Would definatly buy another one from Parmak.
customer_reviews.author: DFP

customer_reviews.title: Bought two units, they both failed in two years
customer_reviews.text: 100% failure rate for the two units I bought. Both units failed at the electronics (charge controller) level. The battery and solar panels are still good, which I will re-use on a new charger from another company. I rely on these chargers for my farm, and can't wait to send this in for warranty work, which is why my low rating. Should last longer than a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Archambault

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: I have two now. The first one has worked flawlessly for 5 years and I haven't even had to replace the battery. Excellent quality. Still looks brand new. I use one to run three strands around a 2-acre field and consistently get 12,000V readings. If only I could keep out the raccoons!
customer_reviews.author: wthattny

customer_reviews.title: PITA to Install
customer_reviews.text: This charger has nothing but two keyslot holes in the back to use for its installation. That might be acceptable, except that on the unit I received the holes were about 50% blocked by some hard plastic component on the inside of the charger. This limited to size of screws that could be used for mounting, and took a fair amount of manipulating and four letter words to get he charger mounted. I would give "Easy to Install" zero stars if that were an option. I hope it works better than it mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not New as advertised, rebuilt models non-OEM parts
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 6 of these and none of them were new as advertised. They were all rebuilt or re-manufactured with non-OEM parts. It is particularly obvious because none of the solar panels are correct to the OEM and they don't even match each-other. Their power needles never show a full charge either like a new unit does. I own probably 20 of these fence chargers so I definitely know that these do not look or perform the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some are over 15 years old and still running just like the day they were installed
customer_reviews.text: We own several of these fence chargers. Some are over 15 years old and still running just like the day they were installed. We think these are the best on the market. and will not buy another brand. Do your self a favor and buy one - you will not be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Cox

customer_reviews.title: If You're Serious About Your Electric Fence Protection, This is the Product for You
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, well constructed, durable product. Powerful. Easy to install, operate and maintain. You get what you pay for at this price. My only issue is that mine came up missing after 4 years, so mounting it securely (out of reach now in my case) may be advisable. I also added two screws to secure the top cover (panel mounted to this), so the cover wouldn't inadvertently come off. The cover snaps in place, but I wanted something more secure, so adding the two screws ensured that the cover could not come off without a tool.
customer_reviews.author: MapLeaf

customer_reviews.title: Solid, works, arrived fully charged.
customer_reviews.text: Solid, works, arrived fully charged. I'm not quite getting the arc (fat spark though) I expect from 3 joules despite having 27 feet of grounding rod in the ground but I don't quite have the gumption to touch the wire and field test it. The battery is holding strong despite the sun being further south than overhead. I'll update this review when I or the dog actually touch it and after a prolonged cloudy period.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore Witte

customer_reviews.title: Completely works against deer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to keep a deer herd out of my vegetable garden this past year. It exceeded my expectations! I used just one grounding rod and polytape. The deer never got into my tomatoes or other garden crops once. Additionally, I think it spooked the deer so much that it kept them out of much of the rest of my yard. What a pleasure. It was easy to install and trouble free. I cannot wait to use it again next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: So glad to own this!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Keeps my goats in and has a strong charge. Always "clicking away" and has never lost charge even over many cloudy days. The key is to have 3 grounding rods. Don't skip this as it is the reason most people think solar chargers don't work well. The grounding rods are important!
customer_reviews.author: isaacbaby

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This worked right out of the box! Full charge and has stayed charged for a full 10 weeks. Charge is low now, but we've had very little sun lately. I'm very pleased with this item. We had ice a couple days ago and it worked hard to keep the fence charged and pretty much drained, however, the little sun we had charged it enough. I also have a charger for this if I need to use it. The little sun we get so far this winter seems to keep it charged for a while.
customer_reviews.author: ANON YMOUS

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for better luck this time
customer_reviews.text: My last Parmak performed well for only a year. Previous models in last 15 yrs still working. We’ll withhold judgement on new model for a year or so.
customer_reviews.author: M. Estridge

customer_reviews.title: Worry-free
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 6 volt Parmak unit with this 12 volt one so up and running in less than 5 minutes. Tracks in the snow confirm that animals go around it, keeping our bee yard secure.
customer_reviews.author: Brook Worm

customer_reviews.title: Kinda expensive, but worth it .
customer_reviews.text: So far this product works exactly as described. We bought it to keep deer out of our garden and , no deer!
customer_reviews.author: Delynn Monty

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this! Bought something cheaper at the local feed ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Bought something cheaper at the local feed store and ended up returning it (they sold it as coming with a battery; which it didn't and they didn't sell it. I was not amused). Bought this and it's AMAZING! I live in the desert and it's sunny 95% of the time. Set-up was super simple. And I get a *good* charge off of this. Meant to be kept outdoors and weatherproof (just put it off the ground some)- it's basically maintenance free. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jaded_i

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using it to power an electric fence around our 60' x 100' garden since spring, and we recently ran the wire around our 4' x 8' chicken coop . It has worked great with strong current, even as we lose daylight. Order was easy, shipping was fast.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Accidental dog test
customer_reviews.text: Installation went well after sitting in the sun for a couple days. After turning it on I was trying to use a piece of grass to make sure it was working. I was startled by a yelp and turned to see the dog running away. Needless to say the fence is working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have had it up and running for about a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it up and running for about a month now. The goats and dogs quickly learned not to get near the wire. I haven't been brave enough to touch it myself because of the reaction of my dogs hitting it ( they are both one hundred pound bulldogs). I did install 3 8' ground rods spaced 10' apart. I only have about 3000' of wire ran with plans on doubling it before I will be done.
customer_reviews.author: mike clark

customer_reviews.title: Great for bee yard
customer_reviews.text: Now had it up for some months and is working for our bee yard and keeping the bears away.
customer_reviews.author: Queen bee

customer_reviews.title: It's working so far with not the greatest sunlight recharging the battery but it still has full ...
customer_reviews.text: It's working so far with not the greatest sunlight recharging the battery but it still has full power and is operating as expected. Shocks the hell out of me so I'd expect it to do the job around the apiary.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Martin

customer_reviews.title: We have one like this and really like it, so hoping this one is just as good.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I didn't like was when I open the box the top was off the unit.
customer_reviews.author: PC

customer_reviews.title: super heavy
customer_reviews.text: I had not realized it was enormously heavy, so returned it
customer_reviews.author: bsw

customer_reviews.title: One shock then livestock know it.
customer_reviews.text: Cows, calves and horses don’t like it, even the dog doesn’t like it. Over 6k feet length and goin strong all the way to end. All learned quick. Forgot and left it off for three weeks and nothing got out.
customer_reviews.author: KP Farms

customer_reviews.title: Dead battery after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for awhile during the summer. Visited my bee yard this past week and the battery was dead (6 months). Plenty of solar available here in New Mexico. I need to buy 3 more chargers looks like I'll be shopping around. Under warranty for 2 years but who wants to fool around shippi8ng a batter back (at my cost) and then wait for factory service and a new one to be sent.
customer_reviews.author: John Santa Fe

customer_reviews.title: No more chasing horses..............
customer_reviews.text: I've used this fencer for over a year now and have had zero problems. My ground is incredibly rocky, preventing me from using a standard ground rod. The company was very helpful with alternative ideas that were easy to try and actually worked. I charged the battery prior to use and the battery indicator has been "in the green" ever since. I live in the MidAtlantic region and have plenty of cloudy, gray days but the fencer continues to work. I highly recommend this fencer for maintenance free, worry free animal containment!
customer_reviews.author: Born to Ride

customer_reviews.title: works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Left it in the sun for a few days when I first received. Installed on the fence and has worked liked a charm ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Works good in direct sunlight,good 2 year warranty.
customer_reviews.text: It works good for me on a high tensile perimeter fence. Just got back from vacation and it wasn't working. After a year and 9 months I just sent it back to the manufacturer for repairs or replacement under the 2 year warranty, even if lightning takes it out.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M Bazor

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Hit’s like a nine pound hammer. Slip up and touch this bad boy you’re gonna remember it. On a full charge I’d put this agains’t any 120v charger. Keeps cattle in no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Set this up in April for my apiary, suddenly stopped working on Sept.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Parmak 12
customer_reviews.text: This fencer works great. We have it set up around our vegetable garden to help keep out deer and other pests. When tested with a blade of grass, it seems to deliver a good jolt, which is exactly what we wanted. It is extremely simple to turn on and off, looks good, we have no complaints. We installed ours on a 4x4 post anchored in cement (the box is very heavy, much heavier than we expected). We used 3 6ft grounding rods connected by copper wire, and our fence meter says it is working within optimal range. Be sure to open up the protective box and ensure all of the wires are connected, as ours weren't!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: The electric fence works well when its nice and dry
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Parmak that I buy, the first a 6PAK.The electric fence works well when its nice and dry, but when it rains it looses it power. Sometimes, when I come out in the morning, they have lost some of their power and and its in the yellow or red area.
customer_reviews.author: Alexios

customer_reviews.title: The unit has been in service for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: The unit has been in service for over a year with no issues; the deer don't challenge it and the fruit trees haven't lost a leaf.
customer_reviews.author: Harry J. Reid

customer_reviews.title: A three are working
customer_reviews.text: We have three of these in service, the oldest being 4 years, in a rain forest. Still working. One came broken and was exchanged. 30 miles is overkill, but I like the extra power in case we have minor electrical shorts (grass usually).
customer_reviews.author: T. Burton

customer_reviews.title: Can not rate something that never worked
customer_reviews.text: Can't really rate the fencer got it had it sitting in Sun for many days to charge hooked it up and doesn't work
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob

customer_reviews.title: Unit works well.
customer_reviews.text: Battery is not well secured inside unit and they use scrap cardboard to keep it from rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Geis

customer_reviews.title: lot's of power
customer_reviews.text: High output. I can ground the output and still get a spark, with a grounded screw driver, half way along the same wire. Other than the 'clicking' I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very strong fence. We have 2 separate horse pastures ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong fence. We have 2 separate horse pastures one with three strand and the other two strand over 4 acres and it is a very hot box. We have no problem keeping two ponies and 3 horses in the fence they won't go around it.
customer_reviews.author: Dora Long

customer_reviews.title: Parma is quality.
customer_reviews.text: Has been in use for several months now in a particular gloomy and rainy winter. The energizer has continued to work and maintain a charge.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Good and hot
customer_reviews.text: We really like the fencer. The horses and cattle do not. That's a good thing. It is very heavy. We had to take the battery out to install it because of the weight buy our mounting board is up sort of high off the ground. I would have given it 5 stars but we didn't get any manual so we just went by what seemed right from previous fencers to install it.
customer_reviews.author: judgej

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Have 7 of these units working for several years. Have tried several other brands without success. I would recommend the 12 volt unit to anyone in the cattle business.
customer_reviews.author: will quick

customer_reviews.title: So far so good, had it for few months in the summer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, had it for few months in the summer, it is protecting bees. I know it works because my cat touched it and she RAN so fast!
customer_reviews.author: Ilka

customer_reviews.title: Good for black bear.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had one of these chugging away on my bee yard for three years non stop. I have watched black bears come over and stop ten feet away from the fence. I am in a high black bear population area with no trouble as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R. Henson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent outcome
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a replacement/ extra protection. It has been in use for about a month and I am extremely happy with the results. It has stopped my boer goats from leaning or jumping the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos A. Benavides

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Best solar fencer out there as far ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Best solar fencer out there as far as I have found. This WILL sit you down. Installed correctly, I am confident no bear will be troubling my hives.
customer_reviews.author: Phantiron

customer_reviews.title: Great. Mantained a constant 7000 volts on my pasture ...
customer_reviews.text: Great. Mantained a constant 7000 volts on my pasture lines through weed growth and fallen twigs.
customer_reviews.author: JamesFleener

customer_reviews.title: Works only in summer
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the summer, as soon as it’s cloudy and temps start to drop it dies for the rest of the winter. Works great WHEN it works. Would only recommend for temporary fences.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my beef cattle even my 2,000 pound bull wont come near the fence. Best solar charger I have bought provides a consistent snap. Very powerful but follow the instructions and let it charge before connecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great but needs a t post set up
customer_reviews.text: Great product, needed a little ingenuity to set it up on a t post it only has a place for screwing to a wall. I may need a better ground but it does not have a extremely strong zap.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to protect a small apiary from black bear. Land has no power and I don't get out to visit much, so solar was pretty much the only option. Well made product and keeps a charge (even in western washington, the land of constant drizzle).
customer_reviews.author: MattCB

customer_reviews.title: Works great for my bees.
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my bees. I didn’t want to test it out though
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Easy product to set up and install. The only problem I had was getting my ground wire to make the connection on the unit itself, and that was really more of an operator error. The instruction were easy to understand. It gave examples of deferent hook up options and was thorough on ground hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works just like the original
customer_reviews.text: Had to replace the Solar Pak since my 3 year old original got destroyed by a falling tree.
customer_reviews.author: ahbjr

customer_reviews.title: good luck getting a factory repair with those
customer_reviews.text: Over the years I've owned 4 of these, they are very powerful and reliable. I've tried Zareba, good luck getting a factory repair with those. For a solar charger I'll stick with Parmak.
customer_reviews.author: CTPhil

customer_reviews.title: ... this brand for 15 plus yrs now am very happy with. shipping was fast from this supplier
customer_reviews.text: have used this brand for 15 plus yrs now am very happy with. shipping was fast from this supplier.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super great outdoor fence SOLAR charger
customer_reviews.text: Super great outdoor fence SOLAR charger. This is my second one, not a replacement but an additional fence charger, they last a LONG time.
customer_reviews.author: JG

customer_reviews.title: wild horse's
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping UPS is awesome This has some power my horse's totally respect the Line.
customer_reviews.author: RAL

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! I haven't had to chase a loose cow ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I haven't had to chase a loose cow since we bought it! Has held up well to weather conditions
customer_reviews.author: jenn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I have used this brand before. They work great, easy to install dependable, lasts a long time. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fencer!
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't what we were looking for to keep out bears, but is stronger than the regular ones & great people to deal with!
customer_reviews.author: Deb R

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Good machine, third one I bought. First one is still going 3 years now.
customer_reviews.author: Music addiction

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: very well made here in the good old USA ! set up a fenced in area for bee hives to keep bears out.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Vitali

customer_reviews.title: Impressive power. We haven't had a single problem all ...
customer_reviews.text: Impressive power. We haven't had a single problem all summer with it's effectiveness, despite some of the days where we lacked sun in our northern climate during spring/early summer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps our bull in line. Weeds don't seem to interfere with it's performance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivered charged and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: How do you say ZAAP! It is strong and works well to protect my bees from anymore bear raids or other mischievous wildlife near my beehives. Delivered charged and easy to use, heavy so mount well. One year old this week and this morning I watched a 250 lb black bear jump back and run away after a good healthy zap from my parmak while it protected the bee hives and that is after a solid week of no sunshine! very cool proactive and responsible approach for bee keepers. It also held a charge all winter . I highly recomend and never take the time to do reviews...so that should alone should mean something.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Reliable for honeybee electric fence.
customer_reviews.text: We are using this for the electric fence around our honeybee hives - we have black bear. So far, so good, after three months.
customer_reviews.author: Greeneyes

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty ZAP with this charger!
customer_reviews.text: Holds a great charge, and has quite the zap! I use this charger with horse guard fence, and my geldings really respect it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bromley

customer_reviews.title: Powerful charger with easy to read output meter
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit in keeping my electric fence charged. Easy installation & plenty of joules output to keep cows from getting close to fence wire.
customer_reviews.author: F Grogan

customer_reviews.title: Horses respect it!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 of these and when a wind storm damaged one of them we without hesitation purchased another one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: It is a great charger. I have a Gallagher I purchased from ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a great charger. I have a Gallagher I purchased from a local farm store for the same money. This is much better. I like that it has a needle that shows you the charge.
customer_reviews.author: J. mccure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one on the property. Even contains our stubborn pigs.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the sheep in, and predators out.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of power. Very heavy duty. Built like a tank.
customer_reviews.author: James Dinsmore

customer_reviews.title: Nice and beefy
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a huge electric fence that goes on for miles, but I do live in an area with a lot of trees. This unit has a large enough solar panel that it is able to keep my 1-acre paddock charged and electric even in the dead of winter when it only gets a few hours of sun.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa R. Winey

customer_reviews.title: Buy ground rod and wires as well
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with ground rod or wires to hook up to fence.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up once you buy grounding wire and fencing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very good quality product works great best charger I have had yet
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Great fencer. I found several places in my fence ...
customer_reviews.text: Great fencer. I found several places in my fence line that where grounded and it would have killed any other product. This one barely noticed.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara OLeary

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Spoke to Parmar prior to purchase. Very helpful people and a great product. Very pleased.

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve used
customer_reviews.text: Great for holistic management program or any management type that rotates often

customer_reviews.title: Great solid brand built tough
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power ran around 80 acres. Charged even in cloudy weather. Great solid brand built tough.

customer_reviews.title: They work like a charm and the warranty is great
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these now. They work like a charm and the warranty is great.

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and has stayed charged
customer_reviews.text: Easy setup and has stayed charged. A bit less zap than I originally thought but works good for remote pasture.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: bought this to replace one like it that had worn out

customer_reviews.title: solar fence charger
customer_reviews.text: this is my 4th and 5th one (sold the farm and others went with it) I find them most dependable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric fence
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Worked great with Baygard electric yellow/black wire. Never needs any maintenance. Just keeps on ticking. Solar always keeps battery good
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Fencer Hands Down
customer_reviews.text: This unit has generated 10Kv for two years since owned and has not missed a beat. Unit has held up even during the worst of electrical storms and has not missed a beat. Most excellent product. Hey, rest of you manufactures might want to pay attention to Parmak.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best Charger for Horses that like to test the fence
customer_reviews.text: Great charger, and quite a bit more jolt than the 6 volt model I had before.
customer_reviews.author: West_Racing

product_meta.title: Parmak Magnum Solar-Pak 12 Low Impedance 12 Volt Battery Operated 30 Mile Range Electric Fence Charger MAG12-SP
product_meta.description:
Featuring the latest state-of-the-art solar panel with superior charging power the Magnum 12 Solar-Pak eliminates battery recharging, thereby saving you time and money. The sun`s energy charges the fencer by day and a sealed 12-volt rechargeable battery powers the fencer at night. Battery included. The Magnum 12 Solar-Pak was designed, developed, and is manufactured exclusively by Parmak. 100% American made. Uses the same advanced and exclusive circuitry as the Magnum 12, including Parmak`s exclusive built-in performance meter. Our totally new and improved solar panel uses free energy from the sun to provide maximum shock . . . longer life. No operating costs! Power line convenience with a battery fencer. Full 2-year warranty covers damage caused by lightning. Twelve-volt battery warranted one year.

Additional Features: 

- Low impedance for maximum power, longer life
- Performance meter that shows condition of fence
- Ideal for large pastures
- State-of-the-art solar panel for superior charging power
- Complete with sealed 12-volt rechargeable battery
- Weatherproof, portable outdoor model
- Charges up to 30 miles of fence – 3.1+ joules*
- UL Listed
feature_bullets: The sun`s energy charges the fencer by day and a sealed 12-volt rechargeable battery powers the fencer at night. Battery included.
Low impedance for maximum power, longer life
Charges up to 30 miles of fence – 3.1+ joules
